titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Budget Office, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:08

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of reports, statements, and working files of the Yale Budget Office.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 5-C (YRG 5-C), Budget records of Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Budget Office, Yale University, Records (RU 718). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reports, statements, and working files of the Yale Budget Office.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Administration
Universities and colleges -- Finance
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of Finance and Administration

did.unittitle: 1971-1976 Operations budgets; Vassar-Yale Report; Reading file B.O. 1969 Jul - 1978 Jul
1973/1974-1976/1977 budget worksheets and files; 1973 3rd balance; 1976 2nd balance
1975/1976 budgets 20-31; investment reports and special studies
1975/1976 budgets 20-31; investment reports and special studies (cont'd)
1977, 1978 Jun final and 1978 Jun 3rd balance, remaining balances of restricted funds
1978 Jun remaining balances of restricted funds; 1979 Jun 3rd balance

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
